signIn.success: Please verify your login with the OTP sent to your email.

errors.unauthorized: Unauthorized. It appears you do not have the appropriate rights to access this resource.

authTokens.notFound: Unauthorized. We could not find the authorization for that token.

otp.invalidPurpose: This is not a valid purpose for an OTP.
otp.notFound: Sorry. You have provided an invalid OTP.
otp.unauthorizedUser: You have provided an invalid OTP. Please retry.
otp.invalid: Sorry. You have provided an invalid OTP. Please retry.

password.confirmationMismatch: The password confirmation must match the password.

email.duplicate: This email has already been registered. Please sign in.

username.duplicate: This username has been taken. Please select a different username.

clearanceLevel.required: Unauthorized. This resource is above your clearance level(:level).

rateLimiting.exceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.

account.created: Registration successful. Please verify your email.
account.verified: Account verification successful. Please sign in.

account.disabled: Your account has been blocked. Please contact the admin through support@shippa.com
account.disabledUntil: Your account has been blocked until :until. Please use the forgot password option, or contact the admin through support@shippa.com
account.disabledUseForgotPassword: Your account has been blocked. Please use the forgot password option, or contact the admin through support@shippa.com
account.notFound: Your credentials do not match our records.
account.alreadyVerified: Your account has already been verified. Please sign in.

errors.invalidFilter: The filter parameter must be an object with key value pairs.
errors.invalidOptions: The options parameter must be an object with key value pairs.

logging.invalidLevel: The log level specified is invalid.

value.mustBeNumber: The :parameter parameter must be a number.
